Posts.Content: littleblueflowers wrote: Howdy! After surviving this stupid cancer trip, I realize the one thing I never thought to ask any of my doctors is...How to do a manual exam for breast cancer, when you no longer have breasts? Is there a diagram somewhere? I feel myself up daily, but it would be nice to know the proper way to do it. Thanks so much, wise ladies! If it stops the nightmares, it probably won't kill me Dx 3/9/2015, IDC, Left, 1cm, Stage IB, Grade 3, 2/16 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Surgery 3/9/2015 Mastectomy: Left, Right Radiation Therapy Lymph nodes Chemotherapy AC + T (Taxol) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast self exam littleblueflowers KBeee
